original: intros g f x H1 H2 H3. unfold ex_lim in H1, H2. destruct H1 as [L1 H1]. destruct H2 as [L2 H2]. unfold ex_lim, ex_Rbar_plus. exists (Rbar_plus L1 L2). unfold is_lim in H1, H2, H3. apply filterlim_comp_2 with (g0 := fun y => (f y, g y)). - apply H1. - apply H2. - apply filterlim_Rbar_plus. apply Rbar_plus_correct. apply H3.
